verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: By the night as it covers.
verse.verse_2: And the day as it reveals.
verse.verse_3: And He who created the male and the female.
verse.verse_5: As for him who gives and is righteous.
verse.verse_7: We will ease his way towards ease.
verse.verse_8: But as for him who is stingy and complacent.
verse.verse_10: We will ease his way towards difficulty.
verse.verse_11: And his money will not avail him when he plummets.
verse.verse_12: It is upon Us to guide.
verse.verse_13: And to Us belong the Last and the First.
verse.verse_14: I have warned you of a Fierce Blaze.
verse.verse_15: None will burn in it except the very wicked.
verse.verse_16: He who denies and turns away.
verse.verse_17: But the devout will avoid it.
verse.verse_18: He who gives his money to become pure.
verse.verse_20: Only seeking the acceptance of his Lord, the Most High.
